name: Yopeso Bike Ride 5 (Capriana Monastery)
description:
Hello Dear Colleagues,
Summer passed quickly, but don't worry, autumn is a great time for cycling, it's not so hot, but it's still warm enough. Our fifth ride will be held to one of the most beautiful monasteries in our country, Capriana Monastery.
